title: Big Agnes: New Ultralight Pullovers for Men and Women
content:
Big Agnes’ ultralight, insulated apparel is legendary and the brand’s new UL pullover down jackets are here, just in time for cooler weather. The men’s Danvers pullover and women’s Cora pullover are designed with technical offset quilting using bluesign® certified materials and insulated with 850 Fill Power DownTek™ water-repellent down.

The best thing about these pullovers is the medium only weighs 7oz / 198g.

Retail is $249.95 with sizes XS-XXL and in stock now at Big Agnes.
author: prolly
